name: Flappy face
description:
Very simple flappy bird clone. 

After an evening, here is small clone of Dylan Bennet’s „Cave Diver tutorial” from his great introduction to Game Development with pico-8.

I’ve added strength and food, which increases falling strength (cake [+20], chicken [+10] and sweet [+5]).

Each tap on up-arrow makes strength decrease. Below 80 there will be appearing food. Sometimes in very strange places (still in progress).
